name: Ian Feather
title: Buzzfeed
text: Ian leads the front end infrastructure team at BuzzFeed working on performance, testing, automation and resilience. He is particularly fond of working on problems relating to scale: both of sites and of teams.

name: Mariko Kosaka
title: Google
text: Mariko is a web engineer working at Google who likes to fiddle with browser and yarn. She uses code to help her design textiles and organize a local JavaScript meetup in New York City called BrooklynJS.
